terms.name: incidentId
terms.description: Unique identifier for an incident record.

terms.name: impact
terms.description: Magnitude of business or user impact (1-3).

terms.name: urgency
terms.description: How quickly the incident must be addressed (1-3).

terms.name: priority
terms.description: Priority assigned to the incident (CRITICAL, HIGH, STANDARD).

terms.name: slaTarget
terms.description: Target response or resolution time for the incident.
